title: o great somebody hack my account and riot do nothing
body:
yesterday i play league and somebody enter in my account too many times 
after that i cant enter to my account and i send like a 3 o 4 tickets and riot do nothing to help me

replies.body:
so how i can enter to my account is my fucking account is hacked I CANT ENTER TO MY ORIGINAL ACCOUNT IS HACKED SO TELL ME HOW 
that the way i go to suport of riot to help but is not help me because they tell me i need enter to my original account and send the ticket so tell 
why dont see the ip i need help

We can help with this!  It's best if you used an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to reach out to our account recovery team.  Submitting a ticket through your account to cause issues if an unauthorized user still has access to the account.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on your status.  Let me know!
